title: Satellites watch Hurricane Sally make landfall in Alabama
content: Hurricane Sally made landfall in Alabama as a Category 2 storm early Wednesday morning (Sept. 16) as satellites monitored the storm from space.

title: Growing up observing the night skies from the Northern and Southern hemispheres
content: People in different parts of the world see different skies.

title: Strange chemical in clouds of Venus defies explanation. Could it be a sign of life?
content: Is there life on Venus? A new discovery suggests we should look harder.
